p: Arm 1 of the trial consists of THC/CBD 10 mg/10 mg/mL oral solution (LG Pharma Pty Ltd) with a dose range of 2.5 mg/2.5 mg–30 mg/30 mg/day and arm 2 a matching placebo oral oil solution. Participants are asked to take daily doses as per dosing schedule instructions. The study drug is to commence on the day of baseline assessment, continuing for a maximum of 28 days.
